nodes.text: Some time after the fall of the Galactic Empire, the parents of Tallissan Lintra settled in a farm on Pippip 3. Whilst living at the farm, Lintra learned the basics of piloting behind the controls of an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor that was used by her father as a cropduster.
The farm was first mentioned in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
